titleStmt.title: Two letters written by the Right Honourable Edward, Earl of Clarendon, late Lord High Chancellour of England one to His Royal Highness the Duke of York, the other to the Dutchess, occasioned by her embracing the Roman Catholick religion.
titleStmt.author: Clarendon, Edward Hyde, Earl of, 1609-1674.
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
York, Anne Hyde, Duchess of, 1637-1671.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
